ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehehe you think YOU have it bad? I follow Erollisi Marr Can I even use weapons? ;) HEHEHEHE this should at least be interesting, but I think the change is for
ygData.messageBody:
Hehehe you think YOU have it bad?

I follow Erollisi Marr

Can I even use weapons? ;)

HEHEHEHE this should at least be interesting, but I think the change is for
new weapons coming INTO the game rather than ones that already exist.

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath

----- Original Message -----
From: "Mike Roach" <Mike.Roach@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2000 3:50 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message


> Is it just me or does this part concern anyone a bit:
>
> "Items have gained the ability to be restricted by Deity. If a deity
> restriction is placed upon an item, it will show when you
> right-click-and-hold on the item."
>
> I chose Tunare as my deity so many moons ago when I started Faras (April
11,
> 1999 - today is my one year anniversary in EQ) because I wanted to RP a
> tree-hugging nature bard type, the mother of all and so forth. There have
> been times I wished I had chosen Bristlebane but I still think Tunare
better
> goes with how I play than Bristlebane does.
>
> At any rate, I wonder what weapons I have that the Momma of All might
> suddenly find unnaceptable...nothing like a hen-pecking mother to spoil
the
> fun.
>
> -Faras
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------

with the subject submissions.
>
